laboratory_examinations.findings: Presence of 310-390 CTG repeats and a new SCN4A mutation in exon 19 (c.3473C .T, p.Pro1158Leu), indicating coexistence of DM1 and sodium channel myotonia.
Elevated CK level of about 600 UI/L.
Showed continuous repetitive myotonic discharges in absence of myopathic changes.
